projects.name: Blogify - MERN Stack Blog Web App
projects.description: A Blogging site where you can CRUD- Create,Read,Update,Delete Blogs. Created a feature-rich MERN stack blog web app, showcasing expertise in MongoDB, React.js, Node.js, and Express.js. Implemented user authentication with JWT tokens, hosted on Heroku for global accessibility. Achieved responsive design with Vanilla CSS, demonstrating proficiency in full-stack development, API integration, and version control with Git.

projects.name: YouTube React Clone
projects.description: Developed a YouTube React clone using React.js, JavaScript, and HTML/CSS. Implemented features such as video playback, dynamic content rendering, and real-time API integration. Showcased expertise in UI/UX design using Tailwind CSS.

projects.name: Todo List
projects.description: Developed a streamlined Todo List app using React, JavaScript, Tailwind CSS, and Firebase Storage. Offered a user-friendly interface for adding, editing, and deleting tasks. Ensured data security and synchronization across devices with Firebase Storage.

experiences.description: I worked on various projects like Digismiths.com, Vijaycables.com, and a New Zealand-based tree pruning company. I worked with technologies like Next.js, React.js, Node.js, and Express.js, the GSAP Animation Library, CRM software, chatbots, Lucid Charts, the Google Maps API, serverless functions, Web Hook, etc.
I worked on various real-life projects which helped in improving my technical skills and increasing my domain.
